title: We Held On
note:
This song is about the moments I almost lost her... and the reasons I didn’t.

We’re both stubborn. We’ve had our share of hard nights and heavy silence. There were times I didn’t know how to fix it... only that I didn’t want to lose her.

We Held On is my reflection on those fights... not the loud kind, but the ones where love is tested in quiet, painful ways.

And still... we stayed. We grew. We chose each other again and again.

That’s what this song is really about. Not just holding on... but holding on when it mattered most.
